FuncDef: This command configures the default SPI sharing method for IPoE or PPPoE sessions from the same subscriber, having the same SLA profile associated, that are active on the same SAP. SPI sharing can be per-SAP or a dedicated SPI per-session.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that IPoE or PPP sessions from the same subscriber, having the same SLA profile associated, and active on the same SAP share an SPI.
Specifies that IPoE or PPP sessions from the same subscriber, having the same SLA profile associated, and active on the same SAP obtain a dedicated SPI per session.
